isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES60-5 - LUBRICATION

note.para: To insure proper lubrication and operating temperatures in this unit, the proper lubricants must be used. Correct oil levels must be maintained. All lubricants should be backed by the reputation of a well-known supplier. If you want to use a lubricant not specified in GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual or the vehicle Operators Manual, please contact your local International Truck Dealer.

caution.para: Do not use extreme pressure additives such as found in multi-purpose or rear axle type lubricants. These additives are not required for this unit and may, in some cases, create transmission problems. Multi-purpose oils, as a group, have relatively poor oxidation stability, a high rate of sludge formation, and a greater tendency to react on or corrode the bronze parts in this transmission.
